flavor: "내 이름은 나타샤 하지만 나를 블랙 위도우라고 불러도 돼!"
name: 블랙 위도우
text: "위도우 메이커" — 반응: 당신이 조종하는 준비 카드의 능력을 발동시킨 후, 적에게 1의 피해를 입힙니다.

flavor: "This is my mission and I will succeed."
name: Natasha Romanoff
text: Mission Prep — Response: After you play a [[Preparation]] card, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "You shot at Natasha. That was your last act on Earth, pal."
name: Winter Soldier
text: Reduce the cost to play Winter Soldier by 1 for each [[Preparation]] card you control.

flavor: "It's all about calculating how willfully blind a person is going to be. And then exploiting that." -- Natasha Romanoff
name: Covert Ops
text: Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. Confuse the villain.

name: Dance of Death
text: Hero Action: Make the following 3 attacks in order: - Deal 1 damage to an enemy. - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. - Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "We should be safe here." -- Black Widow
name: Safe House #29
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Safe House #29 and choose a [[Preparation]] card in your discard pile → add that card to your hand.

name: Attacrobatics
text: Hero Interrupt (attack): When a boost card is turned faceup, discard Attacrobatics → cancel the boost icons on that card. Deal 1 damage to the villain for each boost icon canceled this way.

flavor: "Not only are they lethal, but they look good, too." -- Black Widow
name: Black Widow's Gauntlet
text: Resource: Exhaust Black Widow's Gauntlet → generate a [wild] resource for a [[Preparation]] card.

name: Grappling Hook
text: Hero Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery, discard Grappling Hook → cancel the effects of that treachery and discard it.

name: Synth-Suit
text: Black Widow gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you trigger the ability of a [[Preparation]] card you control, exhaust Synth-Suit → ready Black Widow.

name: Widow's Bite
text: Hero Response (attack): After a minion enters play, discard Widow's Bite → deal 2 damage to that minion and stun it.

name: Agent Coulson
text: Response: After Agent Coulson enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a [[Preparation]] card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "I will bring this building down around you!"
name: Quake
text: Response: After a minion schemes, exhaust Quake → deal 2 damage to that minion.

flavor: "They'll never know what hit them." -- Black Widow
name: Stealth Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is defeated by this attack, remove 2 threat from a scheme.

name: Counterintelligence
text: Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on the main scheme, discard Counterintelligence → prevent 3 of that threat.

name: Spycraft
text: Play only if you control a [[Spy]] character. Interrupt: When you reveal an encounter card, discard Spycraft → cancel the effects of that card and discard it. Then, reveal another card from the encounter deck.

flavor: "Too bad we could only get one of these." -- Hawkeye
name: Quincarrier
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Resource: Exhaust Quincarrier → generate a [wild] resource.

name: Target Acquired
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After a boost card is turned faceup, discard Target Acquired → cancel that card's boost ability.

name: Counterattack
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response (attack): After you take damage from an enemy attack, discard Counterattack → deal an equal amount of damage to that enemy.

name: Rapid Response
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After an ally you control is defeated, discard Rapid Response → put that ally into play from your discard pile and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Defensive Stance
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, discard Defensive Stance → prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Espionage
text: Play only if you control a [[Spy]] character. Interrupt: When the surge keyword on an encounter card would be resolved, discard Espionage → draw 2 cards.
